| A blue slime:- can flow under doors.
- [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
- has [no eyes](/wiki/Eyeless "Eyeless").
- has no limbs.
- has no head.
- is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
- is [acidic](/wiki/Acidic "Acidic") to eat.
- is [poisonous](/wiki/Poisonous "Poisonous") to eat.
- is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
- is neither male nor female.
- is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").* appears only in Sheol |                                                                                                    |

The **blue slime** is a monster added in [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack") and is only generated in the [Sheol](/wiki/Sheol "Sheol") branch. It boasts the unique ability to encase whatever it attacks in ice for several turns.

## Strategy

By the time you reach Sheol, blue slimes should not be a challenge on their own. However their ability to freeze you in place can be quite harmful if a more powerful monster is near, such as a [crystal ice golem](/wiki/Crystal_ice_golem "Crystal ice golem"). They should thus be fought alone if possible to avoid being turned into a punching bag for other monsters.

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

*"General improvement and filling in the gaps on the table. Also, is the passive freezing attack actually implemented? I haven't actually seen it, just seen the code (could just be good luck though)"*
html:
Blue slime

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
P blue slime (No tile)
Difficulty ?
Attacks Touch 1d8 freeze
P blue slime (No tile)
Difficulty ?
Attacks

Touch 1d8 freeze

Base level 11
Base experience ?
Speed 6
Base AC 6
Base MR 20
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 400
Nutritional value 150
Size Large
Resistances cold, poison, acid, petrification
Resistances conveyed cold

A blue slime:

  • can flow under doors.
  • does not breathe.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • is acidic to eat.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • appears only in Sheol

The blue slime is a monster added in UnNetHack and is only generated in the Sheol branch. It boasts the unique ability to encase whatever it attacks in ice for several turns.

Strategy

By the time you reach Sheol, blue slimes should not be a challenge on their own. However their ability to freeze you in place can be quite harmful if a more powerful monster is near, such as a crystal ice golem. They should thus be fought alone if possible to avoid being turned into a punching bag for other monsters.

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

"General improvement and filling in the gaps on the table. Also, is the passive freezing attack actually implemented? I haven't actually seen it, just seen the code (could just be good luck though)"

The '''blue slime''' is a monster added in [[UnNetHack]] and is only generated in the [[Sheol]] branch. It boasts the unique ability to encase whatever it attacks in ice for several turns.

==Strategy==
By the time you reach Sheol, blue slimes should not be a challenge on their own. However their ability to freeze you in place can be quite harmful if a more powerful monster is near, such as a [[crystal ice golem]]. They should thus be fought alone if possible to avoid being turned into a punching bag for other monsters.
